title: Start
body:
Do you want to master your combat abilities?
[[ Yes. |Yes]] 
[[ Sorry, but I'm a pacifist. |No]]

title: Yes
body:
Left Click to perform a melee attack.
[[ Ok. |yes2]] 
[[ But I'm a mage... |yes2]]

title: No
body: Fine, don't learn my magnificent techniques.

title: yes2
body:
Right click to perform a dodge roll.
[[ That will be useful. |Yes3]] 
[[ What about magic spells?? |Yes3]]

title: Yes3
body: Come back to me after you've slain the enemies ahead.
